T = int(input())
for tc in range(T):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    d = b - a
    print('YES' if d == 0 or a <= d else 'NO')

t = int(input())
while t:
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    print('YES') if a == b or b // a > 1 else print('NO')
    t -= 1

import sys
for _ in range(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
    (a, b) = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    sys.stdout.write('YES\n' if b % a == 0 else 'YES\n' if b > 2 * a else 'NO\n')
